author: V K Rajah J:
casename: Progen Engineering Pte Ltd v Winter Engineering (S) Pte Ltd
counsel: Philip Fong, Lynette Chew and Navin Lobo (Harry Elias Partnership) for the plaintiff; Leslie Phua (Phua Wai Partnership) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Arbitration/Arbitral tribunal/Fees/Whether arbitrator can unilaterally fix own fees/Whether fixing of own fees by arbitrator constituted proper reason for plaintiff's delay in appealing award
Civil Procedure/Appeals/Leave/Whether leave should be given to appeal judge's decision not to allow reconsideration of remaining issues by arbitrator despite plaintiff's delay
Civil Procedure/Extension of time/Whether extension of time should be granted to file and serve originating motion to appeal against arbitrator's decision
